description:
Nene`s brothers.
They are all in the same age and look so much alike that they seem to be identical triplets.
Consist of (in order from left to right):
Matsuichi - the eldest son, defense attorney.
Takeji - the second son, tax counselor.
Umezo - the third son, detective.
Everyone is wearing glasses. They can be identified by their hair`s position: Matsuichi - left, Takeji - both sides and Umezo - right.
They all love Nene but they are treated as a servants by Nene.
They are all voiced by http://anidb.net/cr179 [Konishi Katsuyuki].
name: Kasugano Anishazu
